block.mineify.sound_player.locked: §cThis block has been locked by its owner.
advancement.mineify.root.description: Welcome to the Mineify Mod by MrJulsen.
gui.mineify.soundselection.title: Sound Selection
gui.mineify.soundselection.drag_and_drop: Drop a file into this window to upload.
gui.mineify.soundselection.search.toolti:
Type here to search.

§lSearch Operation Prefixes
%s - Inverse results
%s - Search owner (player name)
%s - Search visibility
(none) - default search (by name)
gui.mineify.soundselection.ask_delete: Do you want to delete the following sound? %s
gui.mineify.soundselection.ask_upload: Do you want to upload the following sound to the server? %s
gui.mineify.soundselection.upload.ffmpeg:
To convert audio files into a format minecraft can use, you must have ffmpeg to be installed. Here are some instructions how to install ffmpeg:

§l( 1. ) §rDownload the ffmpeg binaries for your OS (%s) from %s
§l( 2. ) §rPut the binaries into .minecraft/ffmpeg (create the 'ffmpeg' folder if it doesn't exist)
gui.mineify.soundselection.upload.storag: Size: %s; Storage used: %s, Storage free: %s, Max: %s
gui.mineify.sound_player_config.title: Sound Player Configuration
gui.mineify.sound_player_config.info.loc: When locked only you (the owner) can visit and edit this block.
gui.mineify.playback_area_config.title: Playback Area Configuration
Specifies the distance over which a mono-channel sound is attenuated until it can no longer be heard after more than the specified value as blocks.
gui.mineify.sound_config.title: Advanced Sound Configuration
gui.mineify.upload.title: Upload new sound
gui.mineify.upload.file_duplicate: §cThe given filename is already in use.
gui.mineify.quality.description: The quality of the sound. The better, the larger the file size which may cause problems on devices with low bandwidth or RAM. 5 ist good enough in most cases.
gui.mineify.sound_visibility.info.server: This sound is provided by the server.
gui.mineify.sound_visibility.info.privat: Only you can use and delete this sound.
gui.mineify.sound_visibility.info.shared: Everybody can use this sound, but only you can delete it.
gui.mineify.sound_visibility.info.public: Everybody can use and delete this sound.
gui.mineify.sound_channels.info.mono: The sound uses only one channel, so it relies on a specific position. Most realistic effect for sounds.
gui.mineify.sound_channels.info.stereo: The sound uses two channels, but doesn't rely on a specific position, nor does the distance setting work. Recommended for background music.
gui.mineify.sound_channels.description: The amount of channels used in the sound.
gui.mineify.trigger.info.none: Use Shift + right click to start/stop playing sounds.
gui.mineify.trigger.info.continuous_reds: The playlist is only playing while this block is powered by redstone.
gui.mineify.trigger.info.redstone_impuls: A redstone impulse (e.g. from a button) starts the playlist.
gui.mineify.trigger.description: The condition under which the playlist is started.
gui.mineify.playback_area_type.info.radi: Playing the sound to all players in a circular area with the given radius around the block.
gui.mineify.playback_area_type.info.zone: Playling the sound to all players in a box area with the given size relative to the position of the block.
gui.mineify.playback_area_type.descripti: The area in which players will hear sounds played by this block.
